title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: local LLM runner with a built-in model library (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc.) and a simple CLI/API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API—works in Node, Bun, Deno and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list models with a few lines of code.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain community integration for Ollama—drop local Llama/Mistral into any LangChain pipeline.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, multi-user, dark/light themes).

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app that streams responses from a local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based TUI client for Ollama with syntax highlighting and conversation history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama—chat, generate, pull, list, delete models from JVM apps.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-go
summary: Idiomatic Go client for Ollama with context cancellation and streaming.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.x integration to use Ollama models as generators or chatters in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: FastAPI wrapper, Next.js chat, Discord bot, model fine-tune scripts.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & CUDA) with multi-arch support for running Ollama anywhere.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix package derivation for Ollama—pin versions and deploy reproducible binaries.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that sends selected notes to an Ollama model for summarization or Q&A.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that brings local LLMs into any server with slash commands.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Lightweight Slack bot using Socket-mode to answer questions via Ollama models.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate for Ollama with async/await and serde types.
